films.title: The Giant Gila Monster
films.description: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.

films.title: Manos: The Hands Of Fate
films.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

films.title: Plan 9 From Outer Space
films.description: Aliens resurrect dead humans as zombies and vampires to stop humanity from creating the Solaranite (a sort of sun-driven bomb).

films.title: The Room
films.description: Johnny is a successful banker who lives happily in a San Francisco townhouse with his fianc√©e, Lisa. One day, inexplicably, she gets bored with him and decides to seduce his best friend, Mark.

films.title: Birdemic: Shock And Terror
films.description: A horde of mutated birds descends upon the quiet town of Half Moon Bay, California.

films.title: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians
films.description: The Martians kidnap Santa Claus because there is nobody on Mars to give their children presents.

films.title: The Happening
films.description: A science teacher, his wife, and a young girl struggle to survive a natural disaster.

films.title: The Cat in the Hat
films.description: Two bored children have their lives turned upside down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

films.title: Mega Shark vs. Giant Octopus
films.description: A prehistoric shark and octopus clash in an epic battle, threatening humanity's survival.
